data.about:
Hello! My name is Josephine But. I have 9+ years of work experiences as a Software Developer/Tester.  I have solid background in software design, implementation, testing and documentation.

I love to do Software Testing and keep on learning new technologies and programming languages, the rewards come relatively quickly after you fixing the mistakes or solve a problem. In my spare time, I enjoy to go to the gym, making candles, cooking and baking.
